title: Yamaha brings FZ-X in new Chrome avatar, first 100 buyers to get Casio G-Shock watch
description: You can book the chrome model for Rs 2,000 from Yamaha India's website. The amount will be adjusted against overall vehicle price at the time of final quotation.
